website_summaries.verdict: If the best way to get your dog’s attention is with a meaty snack, this wholesome treat is exactly what you’re looking for.
pros: The meatiest treat offered by Blue Buffalo, beef is the first ingredient, and includes few other ingredients, like brown rice, oatmeal, and skim milk
cons: Some dogs may not appreciate its dry, jerky-like composition

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these so much! I actually break up one of the meatballs over her dry food and she will eat the whole bowl, no wet food needed! I am very happy with this product, and so is my dog, and I am very picky about what I give her. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: I always order these for my pups since they are the only ones they'll eat. They like the moist type of treat. Them coming dried out was annoying seeing as though I bought 4 bags. I figured it was a fluke the last time and when those four bags ran out I ordered another 2 bags. I have only opened 1 so far, but they were dry as well. Super disappointed considering I've bee getting these treats for the last 4 years with no issues. Not worth the hassle of returning, but I will be getting from somewhere else from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Raine A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Treat
customer_reviews.text: My dog I’d old and doesn’t have many teeth left due to health issues. These crumble easily so I can break them up and put them in her bowl when I want to give her a treat. She’s a picky eater but loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S

customer_reviews.title: Warning Uncontrollable  Diarrhea!
customer_reviews.text: We gave these to our dog, (we didn't even give him a whole one, we cut them in half and would give him 1/2 of one for a couple of days. He had absolute uncontrollable diarrhea! It was awful! We didn't realize what was causing it until we figured out the only new thing that he had. Once we stopped giving him these he started to feel much better. I don't know if it was a bad batch or if they just didn't agree with him but we will never, ever buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: M. Vani

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves these!
customer_reviews.text: My very precocious picky poodle (toy) who turns his nose up at all treats except beggin strips ABSOLUTELY loved these! I feel so much better giving him these because of the ingredients. The only reason I took away one star was toward the end of the bag, he started to throw them up. I'm assuming he didn't eat them quickly enough but they weren't expired. If I find that he can finish the next bag with no problem, I will definitely come to update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Marla D

customer_reviews.title: SellerEasy to work with
customer_reviews.text: What a great Amazon seller! Sent item out quickly & would definitely recommend! It's a shame that Blue buffalo stopped making them.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Woods

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smelling, moist meatball treats
customer_reviews.text: These actually smell pretty good. I get this brand because my dog is allergic to chicken products. He loves these. They are moist enough to break apart, but they won’t leave residue on your hand like a wet product would.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Williams

customer_reviews.title: This item may be stale and not chewy and/ or soft as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, upon receiving my order, the treats were hard as a rock. I have 2 small puppies and they had difficulty chewing so I had to discard. This is not the 1st time i’ve experienced this when ordering this product. I assumed the last was simply a bad batch but i’ve come to the realization this might be a common thing when ordering this item; extremely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Hector F.

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with product
customer_reviews.text: Meatballs seemed old. Not a typical moist product as usual. Dry and crumbly! Even though the expiration date was months off and package was sealed, the product felt like it has been open to air. Will think twice before purchasing this particular product online again.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great seller and Fast shipping. A++
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my dog and her friends love them! Great seller and fast shipping. A++
customer_reviews.author: BBH

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.....
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these before for my dog and he usually likes them. This last bag I got was terrible...so hard and dry, like rock hard he couldn't eat them(he's an old guy, likes soft snackies). These are usually soft, chewy treats. I threw them away...hind site wishing I returned them...waste of $7 bucks....I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ALT

customer_reviews.title: Buy This Product
customer_reviews.text: Blue Buffalo is the only brand that I will feed my Collie puppy. She loves these treats, especially this flavor. I would definitely recommend this exact treat to anyone who has a fur baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: My 5 pound baby Chi loves these. I have only really given her Blue products so when I saw this, I wanted her to try them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Good value, healthy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these treats for our German Shepherd. He loves these. Would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Glee

customer_reviews.title: My grandpup loves them
customer_reviews.text: My grandpup Winston loves them. So i reorder to please him
customer_reviews.author: Tess Madden Kriloff

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: They are not fresh. The last few times I bought this product they were hard. I also noticed my local pet store no longer carried them anymore so l decided to call blue buffalo myself and they informed me they stopped making the meatballs a year ago. This is why the product isn’t fresh. I will not buy them anymore
customer_reviews.author: Gina sanga

customer_reviews.title: Favorite treat...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these! He will do all the tricks as soon as we open the bag without even asking. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy A. O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: This item makes a great treat for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: We have a English Setter who really enjoys the flavor and bite (chew) of this well made treat by Blue Wilderness! Appreciated that it was available and came in a very timely manner . . . service with a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my dogs favorite treats. He is very picky with food and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are my dogs favorite treats. He is very picky with food and treats, but he will eat these non stop. Great product.

customer_reviews.title: Not moist
customer_reviews.text: They say moist, but the contents of the pack I received were not. Very dry and my pup had trouble eating them.

customer_reviews.text: puppy loves these. You can break them apart to give smaller amounts/ration them out for training.

customer_reviews.title: Not his favorite but still he eats it.
customer_reviews.text: The blue buffalo line is a superbly made product. I had to find great fkixf

customer_reviews.text: Dried up after a day of closed bag and now they’re so hard dog can’t eat

customer_reviews.title: My min pin loves these but they make her extremely thirsty & go to the bathroom more. I wouldn't buy again due to this fact.
customer_reviews.text: My min pin loves these but they make her extremely thirsty & go to the bathroom more. I wouldn't buy again due to this fact. I liked the fact they are made in the USA.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love meatball treats.
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 dogs and they get a treat when they all come in the come at the same time without being called twice. They love the beef meatballs. I have already more.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these, unfortunately my lab is allergic to beef ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these, unfortunately my lab is allergic to beef I discovered from buying these so I wont be buying them again, but man they were great.
customer_reviews.author: Ddaeng

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I know is that my dog goes absolutely nuts when I offer her these. Dog approved!
customer_reviews.author: Mariam

customer_reviews.title: Dog mom win!
customer_reviews.text: Just gave these to my pup for the first time and she loves them. She's very picky but these she loves!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Danielle Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Endorsed by older hound dog.
customer_reviews.text: My picky-eater older hound dog greatly enjoys these treats. Other treats, featuring non-beef primary ingredients--both this manufacturer and others--did not make the grade. This treat is softer than baked (hard) treats. If your dog doesn't like chicken or peanut butter based treats or has trouble with baked treats, try this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My toothless dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: my 8 yr old rescued Bulldog had 24 teeth pulled after being neglected for years, she only has one molar left and she has an allergy to grains. these treats are perfect, she loves them!!!
customer_reviews.author: JLFergerberger

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love these. We S&S for convenience and so we don’t run out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Dog loves these so had to buy them again. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Judith L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: LIKE A KID AFTER CANDY
customer_reviews.text: My big POM.. named Bear loves these .. He goes after them like a kid to candy ... I also tried the chicken , and he just will not eat those ..
customer_reviews.author: Jean Culbreath

customer_reviews.title: Good product but priced too high -over $10!!!
customer_reviews.text: Puppy loves these and I like the ingredients. However, price keeps jumping over $10 so I’ll be buying on Chewy.com $6.89 more reasonable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them and do not upset his sensitive tummy

customer_reviews.title: Yummm
customer_reviews.text: Spike liked them..... just a bit big for him though so I have to break it apart..

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but too expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these! Unfortunately we won’t be reordering. The price jumped from 6.99 to 14.99. Ouch!

customer_reviews.title: They want more
customer_reviews.text: My dogs liked these so much, they would eagerly snatch them from my hand.
customer_reviews.author: Cleocatra

customer_reviews.title: Blue Buffalo Kitchen Cravings Sausage Chicken Treats
customer_reviews.text: We only give our 14 year old dog Blue Buffalo food and treats. It has made a huge difference in his overall health. He loves these chicken and sausage cravings shaped like circles.

customer_reviews.title: The ziploc portion breaks off so easily and it's so hard to open sometimes
customer_reviews.text: My only negative review about this product is the packaging. The ziploc portion breaks off so easily and it's so hard to open sometimes.

customer_reviews.title: My Little Guy Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My Yorkie loves these treats. I buy them on Subscribe & Save

customer_reviews.title: Treats and seller great
customer_reviews.text: My first order did not arrive. They immediately sent another. They have been great treats for our dog who had to have teeth removed. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these chicken meatballs!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality ingredients. Since I started buying these treats they have become my dogs favorite. He knows where I put them and frequently lets me know that it is time for a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love It
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of Purina products and switched entirely to Blue. No regrets.

customer_reviews.title: Great little meatballs
customer_reviews.text: My Charlie can be picky and I guess he just doesn't like the taste! But they're moist and look yum
customer_reviews.author: Katie McClair

customer_reviews.title: yum
customer_reviews.text: Dogs seems to like them quite a bit so far.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I find the beef stew to be a good product. Looks like real food and it is canned very nicely. No odor.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: The boys LOVE these. Expensive, but very popular in our household, so they get rationed! Another Blue Buffalo hit!

customer_reviews.title: My dogs seem to enjoy the taste~ they are a little dry & crumbly ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to enjoy the taste~ they are a little dry & crumbly ~ could be a little more moist.

customer_reviews.title: Doggie treats you  can  trust
customer_reviews.text: Natural ingredients and made in the USA. Add to that my picky dogs love the taste. I feel comfortable using their products .

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them!! Able to cut in half for more treats to hide and seek!

customer_reviews.text: My 2 Bichon's love them. They are easier for them to eat than the Stix.

customer_reviews.title: Hit with the hounds!
customer_reviews.text: My pack loved 'em. Even my cranky, painfully picky ol' fella who likes nothing gobbled them up.

customer_reviews.title: Great treats!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love it! A little expensive , but they love it for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Gets upset when we only give her 2 when she's good
customer_reviews.text: My Karelian will eat these rather than her dog food. Gets upset when we only give her 2 when she's good
customer_reviews.author: Doug Dunkerley

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dog loved them, but a little too expensive to constantly re-order.
customer_reviews.author: John Anders

customer_reviews.title: My dog did not like
customer_reviews.text: They were dry and not chewy at all. My dog did not like them
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Dufresne

customer_reviews.title: Good treat but lots of crumbs!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect when purchasing these but they are in fact round looking meatball treats about 1" in diameter. They are soft and easy to break up; however, as others have mentioned they do tend to flake and create a lot of crumbs so keep that in mind. They are too big for my 10 lb beagle pup to take down whole during training sessions. But they are a different type of treat and she seems to like them. Not a super strong odor like other treats have. Another good quality product from Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: KKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It breaks up really nicely for training too
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this treat! It breaks up really nicely for training too :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my dogs love em
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love these treats it is well worth getting from amazon if you can get free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: g.s.s.

customer_reviews.title: Crumbs and Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: Normally my dog loves these, and I like giving him the Blue brand. But these didn't arrive as meatballs, they arrived as meat crumbs. Completely useless meaty sprinkles. Not one meatball in the bunch. Not even one smaller meat chunk in the bag. Just crumbs and disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these meatballs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these meatballs, especially the beef variety. I use them to give meds to one of my dogs who has an immune deficiency because nothing else works! I put one in the microwave to soften it enough to get two pills in it. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Coulter

customer_reviews.title: A treat and a ball in one.
customer_reviews.text: The dog LOVED them. It was fun too because she knows the word ball and quickly comes when you say it. When I would give her one I would shout out, “do you wanna meatBALL and she would come and I would toss it as if it was a ball. She would be so excited and she actually learned the word meatBALL.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: We use these as supplements for our dog for her ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these as supplements for our dog for her low red blood cell count. These have helped her tremendously get her count ! She loves the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Kpc

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think the treat is fine but my dog does not like the flavor...picky little boy! The brand is a good brand so try it for your pet and see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Remi my dog says AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great brand no BEST brand and my dog loves the treats and prices reasonable better than what you pay at pet stores!!
customer_reviews.author: KelliAnn Husband

customer_reviews.title: I ordered four of these and only received one. ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four of these and only received one. Have been charged for four. Please check into this incomplete order.T Thanks a million. Jewel H. Pitre
customer_reviews.author: Jewel H. Pitre

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This product was not fresh, in fact I requested to return/refund.
customer_reviews.author: Charles H. Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The price is criminal for what you receive. I could've bought a couple of T-bone steaks.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre

product_meta.title: BLUE Kitchen Cravings Homestyle Soft-Moist Dog Treats
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Beef Meatballs| Size:6 ozIf there’s one thing humans and our canine companions share, it’s a weakness for Mom’s meatballs. Now you can share the authentic taste of home-cooked meatballs without any fillers or artificial ingredients.

Made with real beef, BLUE Kitchen Cravings Beef Meatballs are so close to the real thing that your best buddy will never know the difference!

These BLUE Kitchen Cravings contain:
Starts with delicious Beef
NO corn, wheat or soy
NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals
NO artificial flavors, colors or preservatives
feature_bullets: Made With Real Beef, Blue Kitchen Cravings Beef Meatballs Are So Close To The Real Thing That Your Best Buddy Will Never Know The Difference!
No Corn, Wheat Or Soy; No Artificial Flavors, Colors Or Preservatives
No Chicken Or Poultry By-Product Meals
